message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me each round.
Your cut decreases each round Alice, let's be realistic. I'll meet you in the middle.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a slight improvement on my initial offer, take it before it depreciates further!
The money is losing value fast Alice. This is a good deal for both of us.
Okay Bob, let's stop wasting time. I'll meet you in the middle. This is my final offer.
